Package hirondelle.movies.edit

Edit movies.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Movie
    Data-centric class encapsulating all fields related to movies (a 'model object').
    MovieActionAdd
    Show dialog for adding a new Movie.
    MovieActionChange
    Show dialog for editing an existing Movie.
    MovieActionDelete
    Delete the selected Movie.
    MovieController
    Add a new Movie to the database, or change an existing one.
    MovieDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) for Movie objects.
    MovieTableModel
    Table model used by JTable, explicitly for Movie objects.
    MovieView
    Dialog allowing user to input Movie information.

Package hirondelle.movies.edit Description

Edit movies. An edit is an 'add', 'change', or 'delete'.

The flow is as follows: 

MainWindow
  -> MovieActionAdd (simple Swing Action) - similar for Change
    -> MovieView (dialog)
      -> MovieController
        -> Movie (model) 
        -> MovieDAO (data access)
The delete operation does not proceed through the controller. Many would prefer to change that.
